name: daskeyboard-applet--pomodoro-timer
description: A Pomodoro timer that helps manage work and break cycles with color-coded lighting.
longDescription: Get notified when the ISS passes overhead your location.Track your productivity using the Pomodoro technique. The applet uses color-coded lights on your keyboard to indicate work and break cycles, enhancing focus and time management.

questions.label: Work Duration (minutes)
questions.help: Enter your preferred work duration (e.g., 25 for 25 minutes)

questions.label: Break Duration (minutes)
questions.help: Enter your preferred break duration (e.g., 5 for 5 minutes)
